name: eton
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Eton College, a private school for boys in the town of Eton, England: Boris Johnson was educated at Eton and Oxford. He taught music at Eton.
a town in the in the south of England, in the county of Berkshire: Bracknell is surrounded by countryside and towns such as Ascot, Windsor, and Eton.
More examplesFewer examplesAt eight, he was sent off to prep school and then Eton.I assumed they had all gone to Eton or Winchester by the way they spoke.The biggest boarding school in Britain is in the town of Eton, and has 1,300 boys in 25 houses.
